text:
Govt. denies report

The Centre has denied that the Intelligence Bureau had generated a report which said that Umar Khalid, one of the students shouting slogans at a pro-Afzal Guru event at JNU on February 9 was a supporter of the Jaish-e-Mohammad. Some news channels carried a report that Khalid had been to Pakistan and received help from the outfit to organise protests here. — National Bureau
title: jaish link
